message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. We have plenty of time to work out a better deal if you want.
I think a 55/45 split is more fair. It gives you a good starting point and still leaves plenty of room for negotiation if you're not satisfied.
Let's be reasonable.  A 50/50 split is the fairest way to go. We're both losing value with each round, so let's just split the money evenly and move on.
